title: Type ID
content:
I realize this might well be a one off hand rendering, but if anyone had a recommendation for a similar typeface that would be wonderful (For both typefaces.)

Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020192943im_/http:/typophile.com/files/KickapooCatchHorseB_6508.jpg)

-Ian
author: IanCrombie

comments.content:
You might find something you like here:  
 [http://www.letterheadfonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020192943/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/ "http://www.letterheadfonts.com")  
or here:  
 [http://www.fontbros.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020192943/http:/www.fontbros.com/ "http://www.fontbros.com")
Interesting sites, but I couldn't quite find what I was looking for. Thank-You though.

A few possibilities:  
 [Penny Arcade](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020192943/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/solotype/penny-arcade/)  
 [Modesto Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020192943/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/parkinson/modesto/)  
 [Silentina Movie](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020192943/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/silentina/)  
 [HPLHS Victoria](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020192943/http:/www.cthulhulives.org/toybox/PROPDOCS/PropFonts.html)

And two shaded options:  
 [Horndon](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020192943/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/horndon/)  
 [Steelplate Gothic RR Shaded](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020192943/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/steelplate-gothic-rr/)
Thanks Mike! There definitely some hot type to play with there. I'm guessing these are not 'fonts' but hand rendered type. Maybe I'll explore this later.
